code: @Override protected int poll() throws Exception {     final Exchange exchange = this.getEndpoint().createExchange().     // compute time (approx) since last update     if (firstRun) {         this.query.setStartTime(System.currentTimeMillis()).     } else {         this.query.setStartTime(System.currentTimeMillis() - getDelay()).     }     // proceed with query     final Result result = query.execute().     log.trace("Processing exchange [{}]...", exchange).     try {         getProcessor().process(exchange).     } finally {         if (exchange.getException() != null) {             getExceptionHandler().handleException("Error processing exchange", exchange, exchange.getException()).         }     }     return Long.valueOf(result.getOffset()).intValue(). }
